tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GenomicSequencingData (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
    chromosome_number INT,
    gene_name VARCHAR(100),
    sequencing_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE mutations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    mutation_type VARCHAR(100),
    mutation_position INT,
    patient_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE mutations (
    mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mutation_name VARCHAR(50),
    mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name TEXT,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender TEXT,
    blood_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    sample_type TEXT,
    collection_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sequencing_data (
    sequencing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    sequencing_date DATE,
    sequencing_quality TEXT,
    sequencing_data JSON,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES samples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_information (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100)
);
